about_the_game:
Discover Hamsterball Soccer, an original football game with simple and innovative mechanics, featuring cartoonish hamsters.
Challenge the AI or compete against your friends in captivating matches, whether in turn-based or real-time mode, on the 2 playable levels among the 18 offered by the full game..



Each level has its own specific features, these obstacles will make your matches with friends as enjoyable as they are unforgettable, in diverse worlds.

Choose your preferred controller style using a mouse, gamepad, or keyboard. Maximize the number of players with a minimum number of controllers; for example, five players can play with just one gamepad simultaneously: one player can use the mouse, two others can share the keyboard, and two more can share a gamepad.



Are you ready to take on the challenge of these frantic matches?

Hamsterball Soccer is undoubtedly an entertaining game for the whole family.

short_description: Hamsterball Soccer is a funny football game with simple mechanics. Challenge the AI or your friends in two game modes where you can play with up to 8 players across 2 of the 18 original levels. Share your controllers to play with a maximum number of players.
